sections.heading: History of Osaka Castle
paragraphs: Osaka Castle is one of Japan’s most iconic historical landmarks. Built in the 16th century by samurai leader Toyotomi Hideyoshi, the castle played a major role in unifying Japan.
Today it stands tall surrounded by serene gardens and cherry blossom trees.

sections.heading: Things to Do
list: Climb to the top floor for city views

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: Spring and autumn are the best seasons to visit. Weekdays are less crowded than weekends.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Explore Osaka Museum of History, Dotonbori Street, and Shitennoji Temple.
